about_the_game: In a world ruled by Bros, one feeble wimp has what it takes to become the ultimate Beach Body Bro, and that pint-sized little runt is you! Showcasing Oculus Medium as a production ready sculpting tool, Beach Body Bros takes you on a ridiculous 4 minute musical journey through a world of pure muscle, intense strength, and stupid greatness. As you march along the sand your puny frail body struggles with the lightest of dumbbells, but with the support and blunt encouragement of a few wicked Beach Body Bros your body quickly beefs up until you’re transformed into the proudest of hulking meat specimens, glistening in the sun.
